trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Declara los permisos para cargar los tipos de los ensamblados que son utilizados por un lector o sistema de escritura XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> es relevante para escenarios como si se permiten tipos internos que se cargue en confianza parcial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Conjunto enumerable de valores de <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> concretos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using an enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, utilizando un conjunto enumerable de valores <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> concretos.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada a este constructor inicializa la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> colección con cada uno de ellos `allowedAccess` entrada como un elemento y establece el valor devuelto para <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> a `false` en la instancia creada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> contuvieron información no válida, como un elemento nulo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, utilizando los permisos existentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> establece el valor devuelto para <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> a `true` en la instancia creada.

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Las llamadas a este constructor establece la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> a colección `null` porque no es relevante si se notifican permisos en lugar de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.

trans-unit.source: The defining <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: El valor <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> que define.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using a single <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> mediante un valor <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> único.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada a este constructor inicializa la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> colección con `allowedAccess` como el único elemento y establece el valor devuelto para <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> a `false` en la instancia creada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values that this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la lista de todos los valores <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> que este <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> representa.

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Lista de solo lectura de valores <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si la actual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> se inicializa esa <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> es `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> puede ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea y devuelve una copia idéntica del objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia del objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Por el contrato de interfaz de <xref:System.Security.IPermission> este valor es <xref:System.Security.IPermission> en la firma, pero se puede convertir en <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Codificación XML que se usará para reconstruir el objeto de seguridad.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Reconstruye un objeto de seguridad con un estado especificado a partir de codificación XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> does not contain the XML encoding for a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> no contiene la codificación de XML para <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The version attribute within <paramref name="elem" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: El atributo de versión dentro de <paramref name="elem" /> no se admite.

trans-unit.source: The specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> to check for.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> específico que se comprueba.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> includes a specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> in its <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve si <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> incluye un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> especificado en su lista <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> exists as an item in the <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> existe como un elemento en la lista <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> del <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />actual.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> es null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to intersect with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> que forma una intersección con el <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that is the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crea y devuelve un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> que es la intersección del permiso <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual y el permiso especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo permiso que representa la intersección entre el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual y el <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Este nuevo permiso es <see langword="null" /> si la intersección está vacía.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect y la lógica de subconjunto, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> se comprueba en primer lugar y puede devolver un resultado basándose solamente en la comprobación.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Después, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> está activada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> no es <see langword="null" /> o no es <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Permiso que se va a probar para la relación de subconjunto.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual es un subconjunto del permiso especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual es un subconjunto del permiso especificado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect y la lógica de subconjunto, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> se comprueba en primer lugar y puede devolver un resultado basándose solamente en la comprobación.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Después, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> está activada.

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si `target` es `null` y actual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> es <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` y tiene vacío <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> lista, este método devuelve `true`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> no es <see langword="null" /> o no es <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve si <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denota permisos no restringidos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si este objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denota permisos no restringidos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> has specific access level restrictions in <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="false" /> si <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> tiene restricciones de nivel de acceso específicas en la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> o no tiene permisos.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Crea una codificación XML de <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> y de su estado actual.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Codificación XML del <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, incluida la información de estado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to combine with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> que se va a combinar con el <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Puede ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crea un permiso que consiste en la unión del objeto <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual y del permiso especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that represents the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> que representa la unión entre el <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actual y el <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect y la lógica de subconjunto, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> se comprueba en primer lugar y puede devolver un resultado basándose solamente en la comprobación.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Después, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> está activada.

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si `other` es `null`, actual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> se devuelve.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="other" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> no es <see langword="null" /> o no es <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
